#summary Describes the input methods provided by the interface.

= Controls =

The Cogwheel interface currently supports keyboard input only, and only provides access to a single joypad.

== Default Keys ==

|| *Console function* || *Keyboard* ||
|| 1 || Ctrl ||
|| 2 || Alt ||
|| Direction pad || Cursor keys ||
|| Start _(Game Gear)_ || Space ||
|| Pause _(SMS)_ || Space ||
|| Soft reset _(SMS)_ || Backspace ||
